p: Several new studies break important new ground by incorporating variability into the weighting [ 17, 32â€“ 34], but they typically assume stationarity of the pdf of the system [ 17, 32, 33], or cannot work with complex dynamical models [ 34]. Some previous work does explicitly weight dynamical models by performance in variability and trends in a statistically-sound way [ 35]. However, the method in its current form works only for linear trends (as a function of time) and does not account for autocorrelation in the variability.
